rooms.description: Minimalist entrance with sufficient space for coat closet, shoe rack, and a clean transition area.

Spacious living room with minimalist furniture. The layout maximizes natural light using large windows on the east wall to adhere to Vastu principles of energy flow, while maintaining a modern aesthetic.
Functional dining area adjacent to living room. Minimalist design with open floor plan for social interactions.

Open kitchen design integrated into the living space, equipped with modern appliances and ample storage while ensuring an uncluttered look. Windows on the south side adhere to Vastu guidelines for natural light.

Master bedroom (150 sqft) and two additional bedrooms (75 sqft each). Minimalist decor with essential furniture, ensuring privacy and comfort. Bedrooms placed in the quieter north section of the apartment for Vastu compliance.
Master bathroom located adjacent to master bedroom with modern fixtures. Secondary bathrooms near other bedrooms, designed to be functional and minimalist.
Dedicated home office space featuring ergonomic design, ample natural light via north-facing window for concentration. Minimalist setup with open desk area and storage solutions.
Cozy library area with built-in shelving and comfortable seating to create a quiet, contemplative space; positioned near the living room for easy access while maintaining privacy.
Open balcony attached to the kitchen and living area providing natural ventilation and a minimalist exterior view.

openings.description: Front door positioned according to Vastu for positive energy. Minimalist design with sleek handle.
Large window for natural light and ventilation, enhancing the minimalist aesthetic while aligning with Vastu principles.
Window ensuring proper light in the kitchen area, following Vastu guidelines for functional spaces.
